verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu, that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

שִׁמְע֕וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; likewise וְדִבַּרְתָּם֙ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Tam and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei and to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur Cursed הָאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, [be] the man אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not יִשְׁמַ֔ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma', that obeyeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei not the words הַבְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot. likewise

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti Which I commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֡ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem your fathers בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day הוֹצִיאִֽי־ <S%H3318><s%> ho-tzi-'i- [that] I brought them forth אוֹתָ֣ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> me-'e-retz- out of the land מִצְרַיִם֩ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt מִכּ֨וּר <S%H3564><s%> mik-Kur furnace הַבַּרְזֶ֜ל <S%H1270><s%> hab-bar-Zel from the iron לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Obey בְקוֹלִי֙ <S%H6963><s%> ve-ko-Li my voice וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem and do אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אֲצַוֶּ֖ה <S%H6680><s%> 'a-tzav-Veh them according to all which I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem; וִהְיִ֤יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> vih-Yi-tem become לִי֙ <S%H99999><s%> li לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am, you so shall ye be my people וְאָ֣נֹכִ֔י <S%H595><s%> ve-'A-no-Chi, I אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become לָכֶ֖ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Chem לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him. and I will be your God

לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> le-ma-'An order הָקִ֨ים <S%H6965><s%> ha-Kim That I may perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׁבוּעָ֜ה <S%H7621><s%> hash-she-vu-'Ah the oath אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti which I have sworn לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers לָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem them אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz them a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat flowing חָלָ֛ב <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבַ֖שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash and honey כַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as [it is] this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וָאַ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> va-'A-'an Then answered וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar I and said אָמֵ֥ן׀ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men So be it יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. God ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Then the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me קְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> ke-Ra unto me Proclaim אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֤ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim all these words הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> be-'a-Rei in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבְחֻצ֥וֹת <S%H2351><s%> u-ve-chu-Tzot and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying שִׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U, Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei ye the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam.

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for הָעֵ֨ד <S%H5749><s%> ha-'Ed For I earnestly הַעִדֹ֜תִי <S%H5749><s%> ha-'i-Do-ti protested בַּאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> ba-'a-vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> be-yOm in the day הַעֲלוֹתִ֨י <S%H5927><s%> ha-'a-lo-Ti [that] I brought them up אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, to this הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> hash-Kem rising early וְהָעֵ֖ד <S%H5749><s%> ve-ha-'Ed and protesting לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Obey בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li. my voice

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U Yet they obeyed וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or הִטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> hit-Tu not nor inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָזְנָ֔ם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Nam, their ear וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-le-Chu, walked אִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one בִּשְׁרִיר֖וּת <S%H8307><s%> bish-ri-Rut in the imagination לִבָּ֣ם <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bam heart הָרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra'; of their evil וָאָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> va-'a-Vi therefore I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei upon them all the words הַבְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-rit- of this covenant הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti which I commanded לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot [them] to do וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo to עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su. but they did ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; about נִֽמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> nim-tza- is found קֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H7195><s%> ke-sher unto me A conspiracy בְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> be-'Ish among the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> u-ve-yo-she-Vei and among the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

שָׁ֩בוּ֩ <S%H7725><s%> sha-vu They are turned back עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto עֲוֹנֹ֨ת <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Not to the iniquities אֲבוֹתָ֜ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam with their fathers הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֗ים <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-sho-Nim, of their ancestors אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מֵֽאֲנוּ֙ <S%H3985><s%> me-'a-Nu which refused לִשְׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a' to hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דְּבָרַ֔י <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai, my words וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah and they הָלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-le-Chu, and they went אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim other לְעָבְדָ֑ם <S%H5647><s%> le-'a-ve-Dam; to serve הֵפֵ֤רוּ <S%H6565><s%> he-Fe-ru have broken בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- them the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> u-Veit and the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִיתִ֕י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כָּרַ֖תִּי <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat-ti which I made אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam. their fathers ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold I will bring אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem about רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יוּכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> yu-che-Lu upon them which they shall not be able לָצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> la-Tzet to escape מִמֶּ֑נָּה <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nah; they וְזָעֲק֣וּ <S%H2199><s%> ve-za-'a-Ku and though they shall cry אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo I will not אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> 'esh-Ma' unto me I will not hearken אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem. about

וְהָֽלְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-le-Chu go עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei Then shall the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵי֙ <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem וְזָֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> ve-za-'a-Ku and cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, unto the gods אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to whom הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they מְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> me-kat-te-Rim unto whom they offer incense לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וְהוֹשֵׁ֛עַ <S%H3467><s%> ve-ho-She-a' but they shall not save לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יוֹשִׁ֥יעוּ <S%H3467><s%> yo-Shi-'u them at all לָהֶ֖ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et in the time רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Tam. of their trouble

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki are as מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par For [according to] the number עָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei-cha, of thy cities הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha were thy gods יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; O Judah וּמִסְפַּ֞ר <S%H4557><s%> u-mis-Par and [according to] the number חֻצ֣וֹת <S%H2351><s%> chu-Tzot of the streets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem שַׂמְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7760><s%> sam-Tem have ye set up מִזְבְּחוֹת֙ <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-chOt altars לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> lab-Bo-shet, to [that] shameful thing מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot [even] altars לְקַטֵּ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> le-kat-Ter to burn incense לַבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H1168><s%> lab-Ba-'al. unto Baal ס sa-Mek

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah, you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nor תִּתְפַּלֵּל֙ <S%H6419><s%> tit-pal-Lel Therefore pray בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> be-'ad- because הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am not thou for this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, he וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- nor תִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa neither lift up בַעֲדָ֖ם <S%H1157><s%> va-'a-Dam because רִנָּ֣ה <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah a cry וּתְפִלָּ֑ה <S%H8605><s%> u-te-fil-Lah; or prayer כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵינֶ֣נִּי <S%H369><s%> 'ei-Nen-ni for שֹׁמֵ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> sho-Me-a', for them for I will not hear בְּעֵ֛ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et [them] in the time קָרְאָ֥ם <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'Am that they cry אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad because רָעָתָֽם׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Tam. unto me for their trouble ס sa-Mek

מֶ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> meh What לִֽידִידִ֞י <S%H3039><s%> li-di-Di What hath my beloved בְּבֵיתִ֗י <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-Ti, to do in mine house עֲשׂוֹתָ֤הּ <S%H6213><s%> a-so-Tah [seeing] she hath wrought הַֽמְזִמָּ֙תָה֙ <S%H4209><s%> ham-zim-Ma-tah lewdness הָֽרַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> ha-rab-Bim, with many וּבְשַׂר־ <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-sar- flesh קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh and the holy יַעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'av-Ru is passed מֵֽעָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-La-yich; and כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki When רָעָתֵ֖כִי <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Te-chi from thee;when thou doest evil אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> 'az So תַּעֲלֹֽזִי׃ <S%H5937><s%> ta-'a-Lo-zi. then thou rejoicest
